alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Cobb; Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 11:12PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Paulding, southwestern Cherokee, northeastern Haralson, northwestern Cobb, eastern Polk and southern Bartow Counties through 1145 PM EST... At 1112 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Yorkville, or 9 miles west of Dallas, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Cartersville, Dallas, Buchanan, Smyrna, Kennesaw, Acworth, Powder Springs, Austell, Rockmart, Euharlee, Hiram, Emerson, Aragon, Braswell, Taylorsville, Fair Oaks, Yorkville, Burnt Hickory Ridge and Kellogg Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Cherokee; Cobb; Haralson; Paulding; Polk
